name: Skylanders Giants™
description: Frozen in our world. Alive in theirs. Thousands of years ago, the Skylanders Giants fought epic battles in Skylands, but were banished to Earth. With a new threat looming, it’s time to bring them back to join forces with the Skylanders. Only you can put them on the Portal of Power® to unleash their strength in the ultimate battle to save Skylands. 45+ Skylanders to Collect The Giant Skylanders are super size and have super powers LightCore™ Skylanders Light up when placed on the Portal of Power The Series 2 have new wow pow upgrades The Skylanders have brains and remember their upgrades Multiplayer – play with or challenge your friends in battle Features Experience a big new adventure Explore new magical worlds Unleash the power of the Giant Skylanders Play with or against your friends Battle to save Skylands Bring the Skylanders to Life!™
